events.name: Lithium-ion battery life cycle management
events.wd_description: The most critical phases of the life cycle of lithium-ion batteries are managed in a few key countries, focusing on raw material extraction, production, and recycling.
events.description: The most critical phases of the life cycle of lithium-ion batteries are managed in a few key countries, focusing on raw material extraction, production, and recycling.

events.name: DRC cobalt supply
events.wd_description: The Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) is the main provider of cobalt, a critical raw material for lithium-ion battery production.
events.description: The Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) is the main provider of cobalt, a critical raw material for lithium-ion battery production.

events.name: Cobalt extraction
events.wd_description: Cobalt extraction in the DRC is a critical component of the lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Cobalt extraction in the DRC is a critical component of the lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: Chile lithium supply
events.wd_description: Chile is the main provider of lithium, another essential raw material for lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: Chile is the main provider of lithium, another essential raw material for lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Lithium extraction
events.wd_description: Lithium extraction in Chile is a vital part of the lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Lithium extraction in Chile is a vital part of the lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: China graphite and battery supply
events.wd_description: China is the leading provider of synthetic and natural graphite, refined cobalt, and lithium-ion cells and batteries.
events.description: China is the leading provider of synthetic and natural graphite, refined cobalt, and lithium-ion cells and batteries.

events.name: Graphite supply
events.wd_description: China is the main provider of synthetic and natural graphite used in lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: China is the main provider of synthetic and natural graphite used in lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Refined cobalt supply
events.wd_description: China is a major supplier of refined cobalt, an important component in lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: China is a major supplier of refined cobalt, an important component in lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Battery production
events.wd_description: China leads in the production of lithium-ion cells and batteries.
events.description: China leads in the production of lithium-ion cells and batteries.

events.name: South Korea battery recycling
events.wd_description: South Korea is at the forefront of battery recycling technology.
events.description: South Korea is at the forefront of battery recycling technology.

events.name: Recycling technology
events.wd_description: South Korea leads in the development and implementation of battery recycling technology.
events.description: South Korea leads in the development and implementation of battery recycling technology.

events.name: OEM recycling efforts
events.wd_description: Some original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) are implementing their own recycling programs.
events.description: Some original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) are implementing their own recycling programs.

events.name: OEM initiatives
events.wd_description: OEMs are developing and implementing their own battery recycling initiatives.

events.name: European Commission on critical raw materials
events.wd_label: European Commission on critical raw materials
events.wd_description: The European Commission has designated cobalt, lithium, graphite, and nickel as critical raw materials for battery production, highlighting the need for a sustainable supply chain, improved cell performance and durability, and innovation in recycling technology.
events.description: The European Commission has designated cobalt, lithium, graphite, and nickel as critical raw materials for battery production, highlighting the need for a sustainable supply chain, improved cell performance and durability, and innovation in recycling technology.

events.name: Critical raw materials designation
events.wd_description: The European Commission has designated cobalt, lithium, graphite, and nickel as critical raw materials for battery production.

events.name: Sustainable supply chain
